name: Weki Meki
description: '''Weki Meki''' ({{Korean|hangul=μ„ν‚¤λ―Έν‚¤}}; abbreviated as '''WEME''' or '''WKMK''') was a South Korean [[girl group]] formed by [[Fantagio]] in 2017. The group consisted of eight members: Suyeon, Elly, [[Choi Yoo-jung (singer)|Yoojung]], [[Kim Do-yeon (singer)|Doyeon]], Sei, Lua, Rina, and Lucy. During the group's career, they released five EPs, two single albums and one re-issue single album. The group finished their seven year career with the release of their final single "CoinciDestiny" on June 12, 2024. On August 16, 2024, it was announced the group had officially disbanded.
